text: Adrian Pierce Rogers, Th.D. (September 12, 1931 â€“ November 15, 2005) was an American pastor, author, and a three-term president of the Southern Baptist Convention (1979-1980 and 1986-1988). Rogers was born in West Palm Beach, Florida.
